text:
[Verse]
Woke up today feeling alive
Sky is gray but I don't mind
Put on my shoes step outside
Let's see what we can find

[Verse]
Drops fall gently on my face
Clear my mind slow the pace
Spinning round in this place
Lost in rhythm feel the grace

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain drops
Don't care when the music stops
Heartbeats loud like big drums
In the rain we overcome

[Verse]
Streetlights glow in the mist
City dreaming unkissed
Every moment we're blissed
Raindrops play on my wrist

[Bridge]
Hold my hand don't let go
In this storm we both know
Every drop paints a show
In the rain see the glow

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain drops
Don't care when the music stops
Heartbeats loud like big drums
In the rain we overcome
title: Dancing in the Rain
